Title: Log4Shell: A maintainer's story of the Log4Shell crisis
Description:
Christian, a maintainer of the Apache Log4j project, found himself at the epicenter of Log4Shell, one of the most significant security vulnerabilities in history. In this video, he shares his personal, firsthand account of the crisis: from the initial discovery to the moment he realized nearly every Java application in the world could be at risk. This is his story of survival and the lessons learned.

GitHub Blog Post - The untold story of Log4Shell: https://github.blog/open-source/inside-the-breach-that-broke-the-internet-the-untold-story-of-log4shell/ GitHub Secure Open Source Fund: https://resources.github.com/github-secure-open-source-fund/

#Log4j #Log4Shell #Security
